TrackKiller Class Reference

Class defining a UserActionPlugin that allows a user to kill all tracks in an event. This is used for testing purposes only. More...

#include <TrackKiller.h>

Detailed Description

Class defining a UserActionPlugin that allows a user to kill all tracks in an event. This is used for testing purposes only.

Author:
Omar Moreno, SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory
